subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The 6-foot-5 defenseman Dougie Hamilton, who sat out most of the Bruins’ playoff games last season, had 4 points in the first round against the Red Wings.
snippet: The 6-foot-5 defenseman Dougie Hamilton, who sat out most of the Bruins’ playoff games last season, had 4 points in the first round against the Red Wings.
